text: I noticed that they recently added a new piece of artwork to this area. While I don't want to be rude, I have to admit that it is truly UGLY! It looks like it doesn't belong here and just like a random thing has fallen down from somewhere else. The artwork itself is great, can say impressive, but I don't think it fits with the surroundings. Hope this comment will get noticed. It's a waste to the artwork, and makes the lawn ugly.
It's wonderful place with green. Sometimes I group study here with my friends. Most frequent visit the place near to exam time.
Amazing place to chill out and spend the whole day. Inexpensive university food courts and a 24 hours Starbucks. Nice ambiance and amenities, green and soothing. Must on weekends!

It is a nice open area near to UTown Residence, Starbucks, and the Stephen Riady Centre.

It is frequently visited by students to chill or for families to play during weekends.
Always nice to relax with friends
